content: this dishcloth pattern uses the single_crochet stitch and half_double_crochet stitch to create a unique textured dishcloth a video tutorial for this pattern is available https //youtu be/sc88ux6oicy materials needed 65 yards of a #4 medium-weight cotton yarn 4 5mm crochet hook > subscribe to my newsletter 1 to be notified when new patterns come out 1 https //subscribepage io/mfhzxe
